title: Cryptomultiplier
author: Cryptomultiplier
content: I followed a rather hilarious development between Mark Zuckerberg and Elon Musk. Both billionaires want to have a fist show down on who is top boss or for other reason.QuoteIn a clash for the ages between two of the world's richest tech titans, Elon Musk and Mark Zuckerberg have vowed to throw it down in a cage fight in Las Vegas.https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-12223003/Who-win-fight-Elon-Musk-Mark-Zuckerberg-billionaires-agreed-fight.htmlMy question is if this is just one of many marketing gimmick to make money or create awareness for a project they might be working on. Who would win of course?Can such a fight influence the crypto and stock market world majorly?I also know bettings would be made for this, incase it goes down as reported. Who are you betting on?

comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptomultiplier on June 22, 2023, 08:37:23 PMI followed a rather hilarious development between Mark Zuckerberg and Elon Musk. Both billionaires want to have a fist show down on who is top boss or for other reason.QuoteIn a clash for the ages between two of the world's richest tech titans, Elon Musk and Mark Zuckerberg have vowed to throw it down in a cage fight in Las Vegas.https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-12223003/Who-win-fight-Elon-Musk-Mark-Zuckerberg-billionaires-agreed-fight.htmlMy question is if this is just one of many marketing gimmick to make money or create awareness for a project they might be working on. Who would win of course?Can such a fight influence the crypto and stock market world majorly?I also know bettings would be made for this, incase it goes down as reported. Who are you betting on?Elon for the win, He seems regularly working out for his normal daily routine while Zuckerberg just recently advised by his doctor to go more physical for his health thatâ€™s why he take Jijiutsu and beat the poor guy to get his belt.Â  Honestly, This fight will be hillarious but it doesnâ€™t affect the stock market unless two gentlemen agree to wager their stocks shares to their match then thatâ€™s the time stock market will be affected. I believe betting company will surely market this match than spence vs crawford upcoming match because everybody wants to watch Billionaire beating ach other physically.

comments.author: Sim_card
comments.body: This is funny, what are they actually after that led to both of them bragging for a fight that I know will never happen. Base on your question from the writers point of view,it is obvious that Musk is in a better fitness to win Zuckerberg and I believe he will. In whatever way or style that the challenge cones from, El on will win him. I think this is another way for these billionaires to draw people's attention to themselves and their projects.

comments.author: Casdinyard
comments.body: I saw this on TikTok and I must say the whole ordeal is a total knee slapper and I wanted to see every single part of it. Zuck's clearly fed up with Elon and his antics, Elon being the belligerent internet idiot that he is, is still throwing shots against Zuck much to the latter's dismay. Since both parties showed interest in fighting each other in a cage match, I think we can consider this a done deal and we might see the lizard king and the twitter idiot tough it out in the Octagon. (Yes I want them to fight on a UFC sponsored match). In any case, I hope none of them chickens out of this and they really fight. We rarely see people of their caliber punch each other let alone be in a full-fledged cage match. If you told me back in 2019 that these two will be fighting each other I would've called you a dumbass for even believing this thing would happen.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: I don't think so,Â  who knows both of them anyways aside from being social media influencers,Â  even though Elon Musk is into tech he also contributed to the influence of dogecoin because he is a whale and has a big bag of dogecoin and at that, he has to protect his investment at some point by promoting the coin even though dogecoin was created as a joke,Â  but that joke is becoming serious right now.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: it's a somewhat disadvantageous fight for one side, Elon Musk is 51 years old, although he appears to be a person with a good physique, that doesn't change the fact that he is 51 years old, even the great fighters that they have already retired from professional fights but those who are doing these exhibition fights are not fighting when they are over 50 years old, fighting at that age would not be good for their health, I am not a doctor but I have seen a report on tv in which they talk about the danger to be fighting when the person is already at a very advanced ageon the other side we have the owner of the meta who is 39 years old and young, I don't know if he keeps practicing some fighting style but even if he didn't practice he would still have the advantage of being very young in relation to his opponent, I don't know if they intend to boxing or mma, but knowing that they are rich, I can only assume that they intend to fight boxing, it is the least dangerous for both of them, but it is something very exhausting, my bet would go to Elon Musk. despite his age if it was a boxing match he would win by decision of the judges, the owner of the meta would get tired early and be an easy target for punches from Elon Musk

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: Sounds fun. Since they know different types of martial arts, I'm hoping this is a no holds barred type of fight, just want to see them scrambling their fight in the ring lmao. I'm voting for Elon. Though he may be actually disadvantageous I guess? Just the age gap is enough of a factor to see that imo. Still while it may just be empty entertainment, hey, it's still entertainment. I just hope this is actually legit, I'd definitely watch it.As for price effects, no. Maybe if one of them gets badly (like really badly) injured? or maybe even die. Highly unlikely though. It's just a fight, you can actually compare it to a gangster fight in the neighborhood, it doesn't really affect the big picture of well, anything else. I doubt a physical fight would make them lose the trust of their investors after all. There's a reason why a lot of people say it's a lot easier to just punch it out face to face than fight it out while being hidden from each other (idk if I got that right tbh).

comments.author: Captain Corporate
comments.body: As stated everywhere globally since this was a matter, Mark is a fighter, not like he is a UFC fighter or something, but he does deal with it, he practices it, he spends time on it, he learns from the masters to be better at it, and has been doing so for a while way before this was a topic to start off with. I think ts quite important to remember that Elon is a fat person with absolutely no way to go to distance and absolutely no chance to make any change at this point as well. Dude has no condition to keep fighting and none of the things he learns will become natural to him, its going to be just learned stuff he will try to remember, but Mark has made all that information into natural part of his mind at the same time. This is a very very easy W for Mark without a doubt, but better outcome would be both of them beating each other bloody of course.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: Wiwo on June 22, 2023, 10:35:58 PMI don't think so,Â  who knows both of them anyways aside from being social media influencers,Â  even though Elon Musk is into tech he also contributed to the influence of dogecoin because he is a whale and has a big bag of dogecoin and at that, he has to protect his investment at some point by promoting the coin even though dogecoin was created as a joke,Â  but that joke is becoming serious right now. Haha, ðŸ˜‚ brother, how can you possibly be asking who know both of them, Elon and zuck are not just any social media influencer, they are the social media themselves.Elon is a Billionaire and owns Twitter, spacex, tesla and a host of others multi billion dollars companies.Zuch is a Billionaire and owns Facebook, instagram, whatsapp and a host of other multi billion dollar companies.Both are well known all over the world, I bet even a kid of 5 knows who Elon and Zuck is, so both coming out to have a fight is some thing the entire world would definitely want to see who the winner would, but then, I personally hope the fight be like a sports for them, and not born out of personal grudges or hatred or anything negative.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Mark Zuckerberg would win(at least that is what I think). For those who don't know, I saw a video of Mark Zuckerberg a month or so ago on youtube winning a medal in a jiu-jitsu tournament, if he continues his training after that tournament I'm fairly confident he could win against Elon Musk. Quote from: Cryptomultiplier on June 22, 2023, 08:37:23 PMCan such a fight influence the crypto and stock market world majorly?I don't really know if it would but why would this particular fight influence the crypto and stock market?

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: I think I would put my money in favor of Elon Musk. Not mean to offense Mark, but he looks rather lightweight and does not seem to have much muscular mass to face Elon. Elon may not have much muscle but he has weight, which would serve in his favor to subdue Mark.Beyond the betting, I am sure it would be hilarious to see Mark getting his butt kicked and the stock of Meta going down which each punch on his face.Â  Honestly, If I was Mark I would rather to stay in the office working so the company won't go bankrupt after the Metaverse fiasco.

comments.author: harizen
comments.body: What kind of sh*t did I just read lol. Sounds funny.  Can't believe both billionaires stepped down on their respective levels and take this challenge seriously. Reading some related news around, Musk even wants to fight in a cage match, yes on OCTAGON lol.If that is really serious, meaning no script or any kind of related stuff, that depends on their respective health status. Not sure about their current medical condition but of course, the younger one has the advantage here especially if physically active in their everyday routine.Though believed that the match won't happen for real. If happened, curious about the odds if ever bookies will even consider listing that match.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: IIRC, Zuckerberg trained for BJJ or karate before so there's that. That already puts him in an edge given that he has the know-how to fight and he knows a few techniques or so, and he can use that should this really happen (which I doubt). The only edge Elon has is his weight, his reach, and his height. The dude is awkward as hell, and idk if he can still carry his own weight to move around in a ring or wherever in a fight. Then again, we'll never know, not until this materializes and they get to fight it out.

comments.author: n0ne
comments.body: Quote from: harizen on June 22, 2023, 11:16:16 PMhttps://i.postimg.cc/VsjjFCqm/72424655-12223003-image-a-26-1687450581538.jpgWhat kind of sh*t did I just read lol. Sounds funny.  Can't believe both billionaires stepped down on their respective levels and take this challenge seriously. Reading some related news around, Musk even wants to fight in a cage match, yes on OCTAGON lol.If that is really serious, meaning no script or any kind of related stuff, that depends on their respective health status. Not sure about their current medical condition but of course, the younger one has the advantage here especially if physically active in their everyday routine.Though believed that the match won't happen for real. If happened, curious about the odds if ever bookies will even consider listing that match.For sure the bet will have the odds for draw with the lowest value, because this have got the highest chance of ending in a draw. The reason, one person down to other in some means will surely have some controversies as well as leads to big debates. Sometimes this even can disturb the market of the companies owned. For this reason there is more chances that the odds will be in favour of the match ending in a draw. Lets see what's the hard reality.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: I doubt it will happen but just for laughs I also am betting for Elon Musk here. Firm body and I think he has great muscles too. Zuckerberg on the other hand might be an agile human who could avoid all the thrown punches of Elon. But I doubt these dudes have training in boxing or anything so UFC will be their best spot. They can use anything there, just not a low blow and eye poking. They could slap each other or just bear hug all the way until the time is gone. Why am I remembering Barry Kripke versus Sheldon Cooper's (Big Bang Theory) sport fight over a spot?  I think that's how it will end up.Can such a fight influence the Crypto market? I doubt that too. This is all just made for fun and I won't expect anything out of the craziness of the idea. Those guys are the ones betting for the fighters and not hurting themselves. They could just hire someone to fight for them and whoever wins gets the bragging rights.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Age will be a big factor I have seen Mark winning a jujitsu title he said that he is more vegetarian now which will make him healthier than Musk all advantage is on Mark now, we are not going to see action-packed matches because these two are amateurs. We will see a lot of interest and excitement because not every day do you get to see the two wealthiest men on the planet battling it out physically, the competition usually happens in how their platform performs in the market.I hope both men are not joking it will create a lot of stir and maybe bet with their own shares to motivate themselves to give out their best.

comments.author: Sarah Azhari
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptomultiplier on June 22, 2023, 08:37:23 PMWho are you betting on?Here the detailed, Age, height and weight differences. (harizen, you have put the link where you get the photo)https://aubreaking.com/who-will-win-in-fight-between-elon-musk-and-mark-zuckerberg-after-billionaires-agreed-to-fight/I think this is the biggest event millionaire's show in a century. I don't know who the promotor is which I think will get a lot of profit if they organize this on MGM Grand, Las Vegas. So, back to the fight, when I look at the data, Elon is seem lost if I look at how old him when comparing it with Mark. I know Elon's weight is heavier but, his old make slow for movement and hard to dodge Jiu Jitsu from Mark. But again, If Elon's stamina is still good, and he always Taekwondo exercise in every day, It's not impossible Elon won in 2 rounds. I will bet on Elon, Let me know the gambling site I can bet on it.

comments.author: alegotardo
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptomultiplier on June 22, 2023, 08:37:23 PMMy question is if this is just one of many marketing gimmick to make money or create awareness for a project they might be working on. Who would win of course?Can such a fight influence the crypto and stock market world majorly?I also know bettings would be made for this, incase it goes down as reported. Who are you betting on?I don't know if this is actually marketing, I think it's more of the same discussion you've had in the past.... more precisely in 2017, Mark Zuckerberg exchanged barbs with Elon Musk, at the time the owner of Facebook warned about the dangers of Intelligence Artificial in a live broadcast on your social network. Musk teased the billionaire on Twitter: "I spoke to Mark about this. His understanding of the subject is quite limited" and it became a very heated discussion.Elon Musk may be physically bigger than Zuckerberg, but Mark Zuckerberg practices jiu-jitsu and even won a gold medal in that category in May of this year. So if I'm very wrong and this fight does happen, all my bets will be on the owner of Facebook.But be frank.... that won't happen

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: I can't stand either of these mother fuckers to say the least, even though I think Mark Zuckerburg is a 100 x worse of a human being , and that's saying a lot because I think Musk is a scumbag..but if I had to pick a winner, I think Mark Zuckerburg would take him out.Â  I believe Mark is a black belt.Â  Now whether that's fully earned or not I'm not sure, but I just think he's younger and in better shape and that Elon is a huge pussy.Â  Just my 2 satoshis.

comments.author: goldkingcoiner
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptomultiplier on June 22, 2023, 08:37:23 PMI followed a rather hilarious development between Mark Zuckerberg and Elon Musk. Both billionaires want to have a fist show down on who is top boss or for other reason.QuoteIn a clash for the ages between two of the world's richest tech titans, Elon Musk and Mark Zuckerberg have vowed to throw it down in a cage fight in Las Vegas.https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-12223003/Who-win-fight-Elon-Musk-Mark-Zuckerberg-billionaires-agreed-fight.htmlMy question is if this is just one of many marketing gimmick to make money or create awareness for a project they might be working on. Who would win of course?Can such a fight influence the crypto and stock market world majorly?I also know bettings would be made for this, incase it goes down as reported. Who are you betting on?It is obviously nothing but a marketing gimmick. A PR stunt.Billionaires are the worlds biggest wuss's. They are definitely not going to fight. At the very least, not for real, anyway. If Musk and Zuckerberg wanted to do some good then they should have make a PR stunt for Bitcoin. But it will probably end up being some joint project which will be the fad for a while, but eventually even the billionaires will get billionaire-adhd, become bored and leave whatever they were promoting.Metaverse and "mars" mission were easily scraped, just like that. I am not expecting anything great to come from these rich egomaniacs, and I will not be taking a fake fight seriously. Obviously not a good betting opportunity.
